content: loop and pick up 1 sts on the other side you should have 13 sts on the outside needle and 15 on the inside needle  row 1 knit around with mc  row 2-16 follow the chart  row 17-21 decreases are as follows also seen in the charts first needle ssk knit to 2 before the end of needle k2tog second needle ssk knit to 2 before end of needle k2tog 4 decreases every row  row 22 first needle ssk knit to 2 before the end of needle k2tog sl 1 k2tog sl stitch back over  once down to 10 sts cut a long tail weave through the loops and secure 5 weave in all ends 6 repeat for second mitten but be sure to do the opposite hand 7 ta-da  magical warm hands  8 optional embellish the unicorn and rainbow with duplicate stitching as seen on page 6 here is a link to duplicate stitching by spruce knits chart modifications there are charts at the end marked for top of hand palm and thumbs feel free to use whichever chart sings to you some of the options are be nice no ice ice out human rights
